title: Fragment (France), mid-19th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed in red on plain weave
description: Fragment shows a scene of a woman seated in a chair reading a letter to a gentleman who stands before her. Three children are next to her chair. They are dressed in sixteenth century style clothing. A caption at the bottom reads "Le casse chez sa soeur." In red on white.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragment (France), mid-19th century. Medium: cotton
Technique: printed in red on plain weave. 
1906-15-56
